page.title: 07The Pierre de la Fetelle
page.content:
On the cliff top above Vicard Bay, there is a large stone of some tons sitting on the rock. It is associated with fairy legends hence its name of {"....la Fetelle". }Many such stones in the Channel Islands and adjacent areas of France are associated with the {little people. }Many are actually stones placed there by{prehistoric man (mainly the Neolithic and Bronze age peoples).
This particular stone lies on the solid rock and there is nothing to indicate an archaeological connection. A field nearby is the{field of the {fairies}or, in the local patois{le clos de la Pouquelaye. }
